com.easytools.views.animation

类 JumpingBeans.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easytools.views.animation.JumpingBeans.Builder
  • 封闭类:
    JumpingBeans

    public static class JumpingBeans.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for net.frakbot.jumpingbeans.JumpingBeans objects.

    Provides a way to set the fields of a JumpingBeans and generate the desired jumping beans effect. With this builder you can easily append a Hangouts-style trio of jumping suspension points to any TextView, or apply the effect to any other subset of a TextView's text.

    Example: 

     JumpingBeans jumpingBeans = new JumpingBeans.Builder()
 .appendJumpingDots(myTextView)
 .setLoopDuration(1500)
 .build();

    • 构造器概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Builder

        public Builder()

    • 方法详细资料

      • appendJumpingDots

        public JumpingBeans.Builder appendJumpingDots(android.widget.TextView textView)
        Appends three jumping dots to the end of a TextView text.

        This implies that the animation will by default be a wave.

        If the TextView has no text, the resulting TextView text will consist of the three dots only.

        The TextView text is cached to the current value at this time and set again in the build() method, so any change to the TextView text done in the meantime will be lost. This means that you should do all changes to the TextView text before you begin using this builder.

        Call the build() method once you're done to get the resulting net.frakbot.jumpingbeans.JumpingBeans.

        参数:
        textView - The TextView to append the dots to
        另请参阅:
        setIsWave(boolean)

      • makeTextJump

        public JumpingBeans.Builder makeTextJump(android.widget.TextView textView,
                                         int startPos,
                                         int endPos)
        Appends three jumping dots to the end of a TextView text.

        This implies that the animation will by default be a wave.

        If the TextView has no text, the resulting TextView text will consist of the three dots only.

        The TextView text is cached to the current value at this time and set again in the build() method, so any change to the TextView text done in the meantime will be lost. This means that you should do all changes to the TextView text before you begin using this builder.

        Call the build() method once you're done to get the resulting net.frakbot.jumpingbeans.JumpingBeans.

        参数:
        textView - The TextView whose text is to be animated
        startPos - The position of the first character to animate
        endPos - The position after the one the animated range ends at (just like in String#substring())
        另请参阅:
        setIsWave(boolean)

      • setAnimatedDutyCycle

        public JumpingBeans.Builder setAnimatedDutyCycle(float animatedRange)
        Sets the fraction of the animation loop time spent actually animating. The rest of the time will be spent "resting". The default value is net.frakbot.jumpingbeans.JumpingBeans#DEFAULT_ANIMATION_DUTY_CYCLE.
        参数:
        animatedRange - The fraction of the animation loop time spent actually animating the characters

      • setLoopDuration

        public JumpingBeans.Builder setLoopDuration(int loopDuration)
        Sets the jumping loop duration. The default value is net.frakbot.jumpingbeans.JumpingBeans#DEFAULT_LOOP_DURATION.
        参数:
        loopDuration - The jumping animation loop duration, in milliseconds

      • setWavePerCharDelay

        public JumpingBeans.Builder setWavePerCharDelay(int waveCharOffset)
        Sets the delay for starting the animation of every single dot over the start of the previous one, in milliseconds. The default value is the loop length divided by three times the number of character animated by this instance of JumpingBeans.

        Only has a meaning when the animation is a wave.

        参数:
        waveCharOffset - The start delay for the animation of every single character over the previous one, in milliseconds
        另请参阅:
        setIsWave(boolean)

      • setIsWave

        public JumpingBeans.Builder setIsWave(boolean wave)
        Sets a flag that determines if the characters will jump in a wave (i.e., with a delay between each other) or all at the same time.
        参数:
        wave - If true, the animation is going to be a wave; if false, all characters will jump ay the same time
        另请参阅:
        setWavePerCharDelay(int)

      • build

        public JumpingBeans build()
        Combine all of the options that have been set and return a new net.frakbot.jumpingbeans.JumpingBeans instance.

        Remember to call the JumpingBeans.stopJumping() method once you're done using the JumpingBeans (that is, when you detach the TextView from the view tree, you hide it, or the parent Activity/Fragment goes in the paused status). This will allow to release the animations and free up memory and CPU that would be otherwise wasted.
